name: Troubled Towers
description:
2-player, First person game where you use random objects that rain from the sky to construct your tower and to force your opponent into the swirling chaos below.

Last man standing on their tower wins, each object can be placed down which will make them stick in space or thrown at the other player to disrupt them or to knock them off.

This was a game made by Glen Willis and I for Global Game Jam 2019.
